metadata.synopsis: Two mothers and a child discuss the incoming arrival of the Absolute armies, and their plans to save themselves if Rivington is abandonned. This is the second mother's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to 5;46;-15- Talk to the human mother without child close to the well.

0.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
0.text: Would everyone please stop going on about the 'Absolute's army'? The Fist will sort it all out, you'll see.
0.context: NodeContext: burying her head in the sand, very much in denial about the incoming army
